name: That Red Button
description:
That red button, is a puzzle platformer game about:
copying things, a mom bot, a little robot and a mysterious mission.

Use the mouse to select something to copy it. Click anywhere or move to stop.
When you are copying, you can through walls.

Think carefully, solve the puzzle, and press that red button!
You can enjoy 43 level, include 5 boss level and 7 bonus level.
